name: Cristian Salazar
bio: Cristian Salazar thrives in the heart of the midfield, known for his pinpoint tackles and relentless drive. With a keen soccer IQ and an attacking mindset, he effortlessly transitions from defense to support, showcasing his left foot's prowess in set pieces. Hailing from the lush landscapes of Costa Rica, he embodies the spirit of sustainability, reflecting Tierra Alta FC’s commitment to preservation both on and off the pitch.
